description: Best Whatsapp bot made by Dawens V7ğŸ­

SESSION_ID.description: Paste here session id that you have scanned

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enter true for autoview status. Or leave blank

AUTO_READ.description: Enter true for autoread messages. Or leave blank

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enter true for autotype. Or leave blank

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enter true if you want bot to show recording audio. Or leave blank

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Enter it true if you want bot to show always online. Or leave blank

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Enter it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers. Or leave blank

REJECT_CALL.description: Enter it true if you want to reject call Or leave blank

ANTI_DAVE_MASISI.description: Enable this to block or punish messages like 'Dave masisi'.
